redeem(address,uint256,address,address).details: The owner needs to approve the Router to spend enough shares.

params.shares: The amount of shares to redeem from vault.
params.vault: The ERC4626 vault to redeem shares from.

returns.assets: the amount of assets received by `receiver`.

withdraw(address,uint256,address,address.details: The owner needs to approve the Router to spend enough shares.

params.assets: The amount of assets to withdraw from vault.
params.vault: The ERC4626 vault to withdraw assets from.

returns.shares: the amount of shares received by `receiver`.

redeem(address,uint256,address,address).notice: redeem `shares` shares from an ERC4626 vault.
